characteristic.description: Treat this field as an enum, with the list and units in https://github.com/adewg/ICAR/blob/ADE-1/enums/icarMilkCharacteristicCodeType.json.

value.description: the value of the characteristic measured

unit.description: Use the units for characteristics in https://github.com/adewg/ICAR/blob/ADE-1/enums/icarMilkCharacteristicCodeType.json. Only override when your units for a characteristic are different. Use UN/CEFACT codes.

measuringDevice.description: a more readable device class ID that contains manufacturer, device, hardware and software versions in a way that is similar to the USB specification. This will need more investigation.
